name: SkyScaper (UGamesDev)
description:
Progress healthy and fly through danger in this fast-paced, action-packed platform game!

Prepare for an almost impossible challenge in the world of Geometry Dash. Push your skills to the limit as you leap, fly and spin through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles.

A simple one-touch game that will keep you busy for hours!

Game features

• Fast-paced action and platform game!

• Unlock new icons and colors to customize your character!

• Use rockets, reverse gravity and more!

• Use the Practice mode to improve your skills!

• Take on an almost impossible challenge!
